DSVVincent.Description: If using Diverse Stardew Valley's modded Vincent variant, set this to modded. Otherwise leave as vanilla.

WinterOutfit.Description: Makes Lavril wear her festival winter outfit at all times. Best to turn on only when it is winter.

Entries.LavrilUnlocked: Mr. Wumbus lost some stuffing when we were playing hide and seek earlier, but Void helped patch him back up. Now he's good as new!#$b#My dad gave Mr. Wumbus to me, so he's really important.#$e#I hope Lavril feels better.$3#$e#She was kind of pretty...$3
Entries.WhereIsLavril: Lavril magically disappeared when Sterling started talking to us.#$b#One second, she was standing next to me, and then poof! She's gone!#$b#She must be really good at hide and seek!$h
Entries.UwaItAllGoesWrong: I saw Void by himself earlier. He said Lavril wanted to be alone, so I stayed with him for a while.$3#$e#I think he's feeling better now! He seemed a little less sad afterwards.
Entries.LavrilSlumberParty: Boys night! Boys night! Boys night!$h#$b#%Vincent keeps chanting 'Boy's night' over and over again. He seems excited.

I've never been to a slumber party before... Do I need to bring anything?$6#$b#Oh no, I forgot to ask what to bring!$s#$e#Hmmm... Do you think they would like cherries?#$b#I'll bring the bestest tasting ones ever.$4
Entries.SlumberPartyEnd: Every day has been so much fun lately. We never really felt this way before...$10#$b#I'm just grateful to be blessed with amazing people in my life...$u#$b#%Lavril darts in and gives you a quick hug, lasting no more than a few seconds.#$b#Sorry. And thank you.$18#$b#Thank you for being our first friend.$1
Entries.FirstSlimes: I wonder what it feels like to hug a slime... They seem kinda squishy.$7#$e#Teehee!17"/
Entries.KittySlimeNJunimo: The junimo were the ones that fixed our house!$h#$b#Also, my necklace turned all the orchard slimes into kitties somehow. They love to follow people around, but you need to pet them a lot!$h#$e#Anyway... Void thinks the rock crabs are after my prismatic shard.$13#$b#Ellie says that rock crabs are an invasive species...#$b#But I think it's much more than that. There's something fishy about the beach south of the orchard.$13

Entries.LavrilUnlocked: Lavril has really pretty hair. I bet my bow would look really good on her.#$e#I wonder if we can become friends...$3
Entries.WhereIsLavril: Lavril was looking kind of down today. I think Uncle Shane's friend had something to do with it.$3#$e#Aunt Marnie says I have very good intuition!$4
Entries.UwaItAllGoesWrong: Vincent was hanging out with Void just now. It's strange... I've never seen Void leave Lavril's side before.$3
Entries.LavrilSlumberParty: Ellie and I have been planning a girl's night out for the longest time.#$b#Lavril is going to have so much fun!$h
Entries.SlumberPartyEnd: Best. Slumber Party. Ever.$h#$e#I wonder how Boy's Night went?$3

Entries.LavrilUnlocked: I feel kind of bad for that girl. She looked like she was around my age.$s#$b#I would be terrified if I had to live in a creepy old house, especially a HAUNTED one!$s#$e#It'd be nice to get to know Lavril and Mr. Bunny a little better. I hope they like watching birds.#$e#I mean, who doesn't like watching birds?$h
Entries.WhereIsLavril: Sterling was wondering where Lavril lives. I wasn't so sure if I should tell him or not.$3#$b#Lavril has been acting more distant lately, so maybe I should...?$s
Entries.UwaItAllGoesWrong: Lavril looked really upset earlier. I wonder what happened...$s
Entries.LavrilSlumberParty: Let's be honest. Lavril's house isn't suitable for anyone our age.$3#$b#We have air conditioning and snacks at my house. I'm going to make this the best night ever, for all of us.
Entries.SlumberPartyEnd: What happens in girl's night stays in girl's night!#$b#Lavril loved her outfit so much that I let her keep it. It suits her. And believe me, it is the cutest thing in the entire world.$h"/
The girls tried staying up late last night, and I found them all snoozing next to each other on the couch in the morning.$h

Entries.WhereIsLavril: %Sterling looks a little out of it.#$e#Sorry. Did you say something?$11
I can't fault the guy. Once you know, there's no going back.$3#$b#Ignorance really is bliss.

Changes.LogName: Feast of the Winter Star - Portraits
Feast of the Winter Star - Sprites

BeforeMovie.Text: The little sapling looks really cute.$19

AfterMovie.Text: I'm glad the little sapling was able to turn into a tree!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: A movie about a video game? Um... okay.$13

DuringMovie.Text: For some reason, those shadows look very familiar...

AfterMovie.Text: I think Void would have loved to see this movie.$4

BeforeMovie.Text: I heard this movie is supposed to be really emotional.

AfterMovie.Text: I love stars. I hope our wishes come true.$16
Oh... I don't remember what happened in the movie...$13
Mr. Wumbus has so many funny friends. Tee-hee!$17

BeforeMovie.Text: Umm... Is it safe to go inside?$13

AfterMovie.Text: Can you please take me home? I don't want to go by myself...$9

BeforeMovie.Text: I never took a train before. I wonder what it's like.$h

AfterMovie.Text: I wonder if I'll ever find true love on a train.$7

DynamicTokens.Name: JulietInnMoveC
DynamicTokens.Value: emote Rosa 40 true/pause 450/speak Rosa "Maybe you can ask the kids if they've seen Lavril lately?$s#$b#Children do like to flock together."/emote Sterling 40/speak Sterling "Thanks. DynamicTokens.Name: JulietInnMoveC
DynamicTokens.Value: emote Juliet 40 true/pause 450/speak Juliet "Are you sure you wanna know? There's way more to her than meets the eye.$3#$b#And if you poke your nose in where it's not welcome, well... shit can get weird, fast.$3#$b#You sure you wanna play with the world beyond the veil?"/emote Rosa 8 true/pause 450/speak Rosa "What's with the mystical stuff, Jules? She's just a kid, right?ï¿½"/speak Juliet "Hah, just a kid? Puh-leeze, Rosa.$h#$b#You've been living here for weeks now, in this creepy-ass inn. You should know the drill by now.#$b#But a city kid, like Cooper-boy here? Well, there's things out there looking for a pretty boy like him..."/speak Sterling "Aha. I'm speechless.$10"/speak Juliet "What can I say? I have that effect on people."/move Juliet 0 -1 2 true/move Sterling -4 0 0 true/faceDirection Juliet 2 true/speak Sterling "Jokes aside... You were serious. Weren't you?$11"/warp Sterling 41 33 true/speak Juliet "Deadass. If you find her, and nothing finds you first...$3#$b#Well. Lavril may be a strange kid, but she has a beating heart. Just like you and me.$2#$b#Don't forget that.$3"/pause 200/emote Juliet 56/pause 400/speak Juliet "You now have a choice, Cooper."/faceDirection Juliet 3/playSound dwop/warp LBlueberry 40 31/pause 700/speak Juliet "You pick the blueberry cupcake, you go back home and believe in whatever you want to believe."/faceDirection Juliet 1/playSound dwop/warp LRedVelvet 42 31/pause 700/speak Juliet "You pick the red velvet cupcake... you stay in Wonderland, and I show you just how deep this rabbit-hole goes.$3"/faceDirection Juliet 2/pause 300/textAboveHead Juliet "So, what's it gonna be?"/pause 1000/shake Sterling 1000/emote Sterling 60/speak Sterling "I...$2"/question fork0 "#Choose the blueberry cupcake (Give up.)#Choose the red velvet cupcake. (I will find her.)"/fork LBlueberry/move Sterling 1 0 1/move Sterling 0 -1 0/faceDirection Juliet 1/pause 400/shake Sterling 200/playSound pickUpItem/warp LRedVelvet -99 -999/pause 500/speak Juliet "Feeling spicy, huh? Welcome to the real world.$h"/faceDirection Sterling 3/emote Sterling 40 true/pause 450/speak Sterling "Did you just use the Matrix against me?$10"/shake Rosa 500/speak Rosa "Hah! Jules must have really enjoyed that movie last night.$h"/emote Juliet 16 true/jump Juliet/pause 250/speak Juliet "Hush, you.$l"/move Juliet 0 1 1/speak Juliet "Alright, Cooper. You must now free your mind for what I am about to tell you..."/faceDirection Sterling 2/showFrame Juliet 48/positionOffset Juliet 9 0/pause 300/textAboveHead Juliet "*Whisper*"/pause 2300/emote Sterling 16 true/globalFade/viewport 500 599/pause 300/playSound reward/message "Juliet tells Sterling where to find the Abandoned Orchard."
